definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: For decanters fitted with a bowl speed inverter, start up must always be done at low speed.
sentences.chinese: 對配有轉鼓變速器的離心機，必須以低速啓動。

sentences.english: It was not known if the envoys were given access to Natanz's underground centrifuge production hall.
sentences.chinese: 尚不清楚代表們是否參觀了納坦茲的地下離心機設施。

sentences.english: This centrifuge power unit must be rechecked.
sentences.chinese: 這臺離心機的動力裝置必需重新查抄。

sentences.english: Flottweg is one of the world's leading producers of solid bowl centrifuges.
sentences.chinese: 福樂偉是世界領先的臥螺離心機制造商之一。

sentences.english: However, there isn ta general specification for human centrifuge evaluation of anti G equipment.
sentences.chinese: 目前國內外尚無離心機評價抗荷裝備的通用規範。

sentences.english: USEC depends upon the Russian uranium to fund its future enrichment facility program.
sentences.chinese: 離心機取決於俄羅斯的鈾基金，其未來的濃縮設施。
離心機依舊無畏地運轉。

sentences.english: The use of a smaller centrifuge will merely make the operations more time-consuming.
sentences.chinese: 用一架小些的離心機只會使操作過程耗費更多的時間。

sentences.english: The series centrifuge drum wall holes without filter, filter, is not required to operate.
sentences.chinese: 該系列離心機轉鼓壁無濾孔，操作時不需濾布。

sentences.english: Anti G equipment needs to be evaluated using human centrifuge before further developed.
sentences.chinese: 抗荷裝備性能，需要離心機對其評價，才能發展。

sentences.english: We have to see whether the centrifuge has done its job.
sentences.chinese: 我們得看下離心機是否搞定了。
再會，2013科儀展，赫西離心機明年再來。

sentences.english: The number of centrifuges operating at Natanz has fallen below 4, 000.
sentences.chinese: 納坦茲仍在工作的離心機數量已下降到4000以下。

sentences.english: I mentioned already your centrifuge for your clothes.
sentences.chinese: 我之前已經提到了離心機的原理。

sentences.english: Centrifuge for 10min at full speed in a tabletop microcentrifuge.
sentences.chinese: 用桌上型微量離心機以最高速離心10分鐘。

sentences.english: Conclusion The physiological effect of LBNP is similar to centrifugal effect.
sentences.chinese: 結論LBNP所產生的生理學效應與離心機效應相似。
